entry.title: Ruben Vardanyan could face life sentence in Azerbaijan

media:group.media:title: Ruben Vardanyan could face life sentence in Azerbaijan
media:group.media:description:
üìç Azerbaijani prosecutors today presented a massive new indictment against former Nagorno-Karabakh State Minister Ruben Vardanyan, comprising roughly45 charges that could result in a sentence of life imprisonment, as reported by his defense team. üìç Armenia‚Äôs Defense Minister Suren Papikyan is on a working visit to France, where he met with the French president's military advisor, General Fabien Mandon. üìç Uncharted statue on Armenia-Azerbaijan border stands as symbol of fragile hope for peace: https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/809433/uncharted-statue-on-armenia-azerbaijan-border-stands-as-symbol-of-fragile-hope-for-peace/

entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs Team Group expands to EU with Ireland acquisition: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs Team Group expands to EU with Ireland acquisition: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
üìç ServiceTitan made its debut on the Nasdaq, making history as the first Armenian-founded IT company to go public on a major U.S. stock exchange and pushing the firm‚Äôs market capitalization to nearly $9 billion. üìç Armenia‚Äôs Team Group will acquire a controlling stake in Imagine Communications, an Irish internet service provider, marking its first investment in the EU. It did not disclose the terms of the deal. üìç Government regulators issued an operating license to Starlink, paving the way for Elon Musk‚Äôs satellite internet system to launch in the country ‚Äúin the coming months.‚Äù üìç The Central Bank cut interest rates by 25 basis points to 7% and lowered its inflation target for 2025 to 3% from 4%. üìç Interview with Armen Kherlopian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=caU3WqAjko8
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #civilnetbusiness

media:group.media:title: –ê–ª–∏–µ–≤ –≤ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏–∏ —É—á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –ê—Å–∞–¥–∞
media:group.media:description:
–í —ç—Ç–æ–º –≤—ã–ø—É—Å–∫–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º—ã –û–±–∑–æ—Ä –Ω–µ–¥–µ–ª–∏ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏–π –≠—Ä–∏–∫ –ê–∫–æ–ø—è–Ω —Ä–∞—Å—Å–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –æ —Ç—Ä–µ—Ö —Ä–∞–∑–ª–∏—á–Ω—ã—Ö, –Ω–æ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ—Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–æ–±—ã—Ç–∏—è—Ö, —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä—É—é—â–∏—Ö –≥–µ–æ–ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–π –ª–∞–Ω–¥—à–∞—Ñ—Ç –ö–∞–≤–∫–∞–∑–∞. –ê–∫–æ–ø—è–Ω —Ä–∞—Å—Å–º–∞—Ç—Ä–∏–≤–∞–µ—Ç –ø–ª–∞–Ω—ã –ê—Ä–º–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –ø–æ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤—É –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏, —Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω—è—é—â–µ–π –ö–∞–¥–∂–∞—Ä–∞–Ω –∏ –°–∏—Å–∏–∞–Ω. –ó–∞—Ç–µ–º –ê–∫–æ–ø—è–Ω –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç –∫ –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑—É –ø–æ–ª–∏—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –∫—Ä–∏–∑–∏—Å–∞ –≤ —Å–æ—Å–µ–¥–Ω–µ–π –ì—Ä—É–∑–∏–∏, –æ—Ü–µ–Ω–∏–≤–∞—è —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∏ —Å–ª–∞–±—ã–µ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω—ã –ø—Ä–æ–∑–∞–ø–∞–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–ø–ø–æ–∑–∏—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏–ª —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—ã. –ù–∞–∫–æ–Ω–µ—Ü, –æ–Ω –≤—ã—Å–∫–∞–∑—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç —Å–≤–æ—é —Ç–æ—á–∫—É –∑—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –æ –∫—Ä–∞—Ö–µ —Ä–µ–∂–∏–º–∞ –ê—Å–∞–¥–∞ –≤ –°–∏—Ä–∏–∏.

entry.title: Armenia, EU launch visa-free travel negotiations

media:group.media:title: Armenia, EU launch visa-free travel negotiations
media:group.media:description:
üìç The European Commission's Deputy Director-General for Migration and Home Affairs, Johannes Luchner, and Armenia's Interior Minister Arpine Sargsyan, launched negotiations aimed at establishing visa-free travel between Armenia and the European Union. üìç Armenia‚Äôs food safety inspection agency, accompanied by police, seized non-slaughterhouse meat at Yerevan‚Äôs Gum food market, leading to a violent confrontation that resulted in 7 people being arrested for hooliganism and intentional property damage. One protester attempted to self-immolate by dousing himself with gasoline. üìç Understanding the fall of Assad regime: https://youtu.be/6mdBxd8YPqk?si=EKyBSuhYIL-IpZBl üìç Ethical Journalism: Values Worth Fighting For: https://youtu.be/N5C_Ql7QqhY?si=XSHKNJ-SJJFMvSiX

entry.title: A look into Georgia's democratic backsliding

media:group.media:title: A look into Georgia's democratic backsliding
media:group.media:description:
In this interview, Tinatin Khidasheli, the head of the Georgian think tank Civic ‚Äî IDEA, provides an assessment of the democratic challenges facing her country. Drawing on extensive experience as Georgia's former Defense Minister and a long-standing human rights advocate, Khidasheli delves into the factors contributing to the perceived weakness of the pro-Western political opposition. She also touches on the impact of Russian disinformation campaigns, and the strategies needed to reinvigorate Georgia's democratic institutions and Euro-Atlantic aspirations.

entry.title: TAP leads discussion on media integrity and reform in Armenia

media:group.media:title: TAP leads discussion on media integrity and reform in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
Leading media figures and democracy advocates gathered in Yerevan this week to urge clarity, transparency, and independence in Armenia‚Äôs proposed media self-regulation law. In a series of lively discussions organized by The Armenia Project (TAP), local and international experts emphasized the importance of creating a landscape that promotes ethical journalism, combats disinformation, and deepens media literacy. The event comes as Armenia‚Äôs parliament prepares to finalize amendments to the Law on Mass Media.

entry.title: All but 2 points of Armenia-Azerbaijan normalization deal agreed upon

media:group.media:title: All but 2 points of Armenia-Azerbaijan normalization deal agreed upon
media:group.media:description:
üìç Armenia‚Äôs foreign minister, Ararat Mirzoyan, compared the 1915 Armenian Genocide with Azerbaijan‚Äôs ethnic cleansing of Nagorno-Karabakh that happened last year. üìç Azerbaijan says it wants the European Union monitoring mission to leave Armenia and calls it a concern toward regional peace. üìç Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan warns that rejecting Soviet-era maps for border delimitation would be dangerous to Armenia‚Äôs statehood. üìç Former airport manager maintains a farm at an abandoned runway in Jermuk: https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/809113/former-airport-manager-maintains-a-farm-at-an-abandoned-runway-in-jermuk/
